name: Space Storm
description:
The aim of the game is you have to shoot your way through the asteroids and destroy enemy spaceships and get the highest score.

You use the joystick to move left and right. The fire button fires your weapon from your ship.

Shooting a normal asteroid gives you 10 points. Shooting a comet gives you 20 points. Shooting an Enemy Spaceship gives you 35 points (But watch out because their bullets do 25 damage to your health!)

As the game progresses, more and more enemies come and they tougher and a lot faster!

This is my first game so it is not the best and it is very basic, hope you enjoy!
